    Laravel tutorial 101

    less than 1 minute read

    Hi semuanya kali ini saya sharing step belajar laravel dari installation - ~

    Table of Contents

    Installation

    laravel new YourAppName

    CLI

    php artisan serve

    Env

    Database

    Migration

    1. php artisan make:model ModelName -m
    2. php artisan migrate
    3. use Illuminate\Support\Facades\Schema;
    4. Schema::defaultStringLength(191);

    Seeding

    1. php artisan make:factory ModelNameFactory --model=ModelName
    2. php artisan make:seeder ModelNamesTableSeeder
    3. Call factory in DatabaseSeeder $this->call(ModelNamesTableSeeder::class);
    4. w
    5. php artisan db:seed

    Blade Template

    Route

    Model

    php artisan make:model ModelName -m

    View

    Controller

    Auth

    Eloquent ORM

    Heroku

    1. echo web: vendor/bin/heroku-php-apache2 public/ > Procfile
    2. heroku create
    3. heroku addons:create cleardb:ignite
    4. heroku config:get CLEARDB_DATABASE_URL

    Excerpt

    str_limit($value, $limit = 100, $end = '...')

    Pagination

    $modelnames = ModelName::paginate(9);
